snippet: The wait had better be worth it for tennis fans when Richard Gasquet finally takes on Andy Murray in the French Open quarterfinals — weather allowing on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: The wait had better be worth it for tennis fans when Richard Gasquet finally takes on Andy Murray in the French Open quarterfinals — weather allowing on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: French Open Lookahead: Frenchman Gasquet Faces Murray in QF
headline.main: French Open Lookahead: Frenchman Gasquet Faces Murray in QF
